description:
Anthropic has launched its Message Batches API, which offers developers a cost-effective solution for processing large volumes of Claude queries asynchronously.  Through the Message Batches API, developers can now send batches of up to 10,000 queries. These batches are processed in less than 24 hours and come at a 50% reduction in cost compared to... Read more »

The post Anthropic launches Message Batches API for Claude appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Anthropic launches Message Batches API for Claude
